title: Ramy Youssef | GOP Stumbles Toward Midterms as Trump Claims All Elections Are Rigged: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Donald Trump making it difficult for Republicans to pretend they have a serious governing philosophy by claiming all elections are rigged and launching a deranged attack on Mitch McConnell and his wife.

Then, Ramy Youssef talks about what to expect from Season 3 of Ramy, his distrust of the United States government and what his parents think of the show.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
